game.name: Tora Boy Adventure
game.description:
This cute and small tora boy got stuck in a magic world from where now he wants to escape! He has made every possible, but could not find out the way to exit. Do you help him to escape from this dangerous world? Join Tora Boy Adventure game and be prepared to guide him get back to his own world! He would be highly thankful to you for your kind efforts. Make sure to be alert all the time since the entire path is full of deadly monsters and other obstacles. 

Gameplay is very simple and easy, so all you need to do is just pay attention to the details to clear all unique and challenging 10 levels in this brand new adventure game. Make your character jump over the life-threatening souls and move forward. You also have to take care of helping Tora boy to eat as much yummy donuts as you can for fuel. Do not forget to grab the keys, coins and hearts for extra life in this html5 platform game. 

You would have only 2 lives to use so try to avoid the funny monsters to pass him through all levels. Click or tap the screen to start the fun of this cool platformer game! Move your character back and forth using the left and right arrow keys and make him jump with the help of UP arrow! Do your best and collect all 5 keys, and consume donuts to earn points! All the best to level up and become a champion of the platform games for kids that are free to play online, no download required!

game.mobileControlKeys: L ICONS TO MOVE, RIGHT ICON- JUMP
game.webControlKeys: UP ARROW- JUMP, L-R ARROW- MOVE
